unit_name: Foetid Bloat-drone with heavy blight launcher

stats_profile.model_name: Foetid Bloat-drone with heavy blight launcher

unit_specific.description: In your Shooting phase, each time this model makes an attack that destroys an enemy unit, before removing the last model in that unit from play, roll a D6, adding 1 to the result if that unit is Afflicted; on a 5+, each enemy unit within 6" of that model is Afflicted until the start of your next turn.

composition_and_wargear.default_wargear_text: This model is equipped with: a heavy blight launcher and a plague probe.

leader: This unit cannot be led by any Character and cannot lead other units.
